items.title: Shirts
items.description:
[Thank you to StudioTwoThree for printing all of our 2024 shirts and for 250+ neighbors for purchasing shirts and wearing with pride as we support Richmond's budding musical performers! ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjITxDYXZqrh84aSCpXl7j5Gpfun9V-yO6cef7_cceAHEe6A/viewform)

items.title: Koozies
items.description: Grab an official Tiny Porch Koozie over at the Free Little Library at 811 W. 29th St! Only $2 Each!
